text: Kurt Vincent Thomas (born October 4, 1972 in Dallas, Texas) is an American basketball player. He currently plays for the Chicago Bulls as a Power forward and Center. He was drafted out of Texas Christian University in the 1995 NBA Draft in the 1st round with the 10th pick by the Miami Heat. He has also played with the Miami Heat from 1995 to 1997, Dallas Mavericks from 1997 to 1998, New York Knicks from 1998 to 2005, Phoenix Suns from 2005 to 2007, Seattle SuperSonics from 2007 to 2008, San Antonio Spurs from 2008 to 2009 and the Milwaukee Bucks from 2009 to 2010. ==Other websites== *Kurt Thomas' NBA player profile Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American basketball players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Chicago Bulls players Category:Dallas Mavericks players Category:Miami Heat players Category:Milwaukee Bucks players Category:New York Knicks players Category:Phoenix Suns players Category:Portland Trail Blazers players Category:Power forwards Category:San Antonio Spurs players Category:Seattle SuperSonics players Category:Sportspeople from Dallas
title: Kurt Thomas (basketball)
